verbs.description: Cobb [V: has] been the lead lawyer representing Trump in special counsel Robert Mueller 's probe of Russian interference in the 2016 presidential election .
[ARG1: Cobb] has [V: been] [ARG2: the lead lawyer representing Trump in special counsel Robert Mueller 's probe of Russian interference in the 2016 presidential election] .
